attributes.action: If you under 18 you should be allowed to stay on the bus without an Oyster card
attributes.background: If you have an Oyster card and it’s free to get onto a bus it doesn’t make a difference if you don’t have an oyster as it’s free anyway.

rejection.details:
This would be a decision for Transport for London and not the UK Government or Parliament.

You can petition TfL here:

https://www.london.gov.uk/about-us/london-assembly/petitions
